alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 3:33AM MST until February 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Rain and snow showers this afternoon will increase and become all snow by late afternoon or early evening. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Tuba City. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Strong and gusty winds will cause periods of very poor visibility in blowing snow. The hazardous conditions will impact the Tuesday evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. Snow forecast from 6 AM Today to 6 AM Wednesday: Tuba City 1 to 2 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County
